question: Phino Electric Wire & cable (kunshan) co., ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification

response.query: Phino Electric Wire & cable (kunshan) co., ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification

results.title: About Us | AC power cord, plugs, sockets and wire harness ... - Phino
results.content: About Us Phino Electric Co., Ltd. (Taiwan Head-Office) Phino Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in October 1983 and is certified for sales of AC power cords, plugs, sockets, wirings, extension cords, fibers, plastic materials/parts around the world. ADD：6F, No 50, Zhou-Z Street Nei-Hu Area Taipei Taiwan R.O.C TEL：886-2-26594989 FAX：886-2-26595013
results.raw_content:
Header 1
頁面導航
About Us
Phino Electric Co., Ltd. (Taiwan Head-Office)
Phino Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in October 1983 and is certified for sales of AC power cords, plugs, sockets, wirings, extension cords, fibers, plastic materials/parts around the world.
Phino Electrical Wire & Cable (Huizhou) Co., Ltd.
Phino Electrical Wire & Cable (Huizhou) Co., Ltd. was founded in January 2007 and is located at Zhongkai High Tech Zone of Huizhou City, Guang Dong, in China, Huizhou factory was moved from the previous factory, which was established in the special economic zone of Shenzhen, China in October 1989.
In 2007, in order to meet customer demand and to expand production capacity, Phino's Taiwanese investors financed the purchasing of a new factory with a cost of 10 million US dollars. The factory is 30,000 square meters with 1000 employees and has the capacity to produce 40 to 50 million AC power cords a year.
Phino's main factory has a research and development center, specializing in producing certified AC power cords, plugs, sockets, wire harnesses, extension cords, fibers, and PVC plastic/parts. Our company has a complete organization structure, the full implementation of computerized management and operation system.
Major clients include Panasonic、SHARP、NEC、Toshiba、Fujitsu、Sanyo、Makita、Tiger、Philips、OSIM、 Sumbeam、APC etc.
Phino Electrical Wire & Cable (Kunshan) Co., Ltd.
Phino Electrical Wire & Cable (Kunshan) Co., Ltd. Was established in October 2010 and is located at NO.368, Hengchangjing Road, Zhoushi Town, Kunshan City, JiangSu, China. The Kunshan factory was shifted from Shanghai factory. The main products are certified AC power cords, plugs, sockets, plug adaptors and extension cords for domestic sales and exports.
Liang Jun Plastic Cement (Huizhou) Co., Ltd.
Liang Jun Plastic Cement (Huizhou) Co., Ltd. is a branch company of our corporation, built in August 2012, moved from the previous factory in Shenzhen. The main product is PVC plastics, which meet various industry standards - Phthalate-free plastic material and halogen-free low smoke material. The company mainly supplies finished products for Mainland China.
Le Jun Wire and Cable (Huizhou) Co., Ltd
Le Jun Wire and Cable (Huizhou) Co., Ltd. is the company's direct subsidiaries, moved from the previous company in Shenzhen in January 2013. The main products are certified AC power cords, plugs, sockets, plug adaptors and extension cords, mainly supplied for Mainland China.
PHINO Technical Incorporation
PHINO’s Japan corporation was founded in May 2015 and is certified for sales of AC power cords, plugs, sockets, wirings, extension cords, fibers, plastic materials/parts around the world, acting as an import and export agent of varied goods.
AUTHENTICATE
Phino company built its design capability and 26 countries safety marks have been obtained with our products. In 1998, ISO9002 certification was obtained, and in June 2003 it was successfully upgraded to ISO9001: 2000 certification. ISO14001 certification was obtained in January 2004, which was upgraded to ISO14001: 2004 certification in August 2005.Phino has gotten ISO9001:2015 and ISO14001:2015 certiciate in August, 2018. All of Phino products comply with RoHS 2.0 & REACH 1-15-19.
Our certification history is as follows
Product diversity and customization
Phino Group Co.,Ltd, based on product quality assurance, supply electrical Wire & Cable products for major companies around the world. Moreover, stable product quality and excellent service receive our customers’praise and earn a trust.
Since 2014, Phino Group Co.,Ltd mainly has focused on and promoted the magnetic power cord and outlet; NEMA locking plugs and receptacles; extension cords/outlet and cable rewinder.
In 2015, more than 80 percent of Phino products, Phino Group Co.,Ltd directly or indirectly exported to the Japanese market.
80%
Automation Process
Since 2014, in order to reduce the costs and improve product quality, Phino Group Co.,Ltd introduces or develops the automation process. In the end of 2015, the development of automation process reduced direct labor by 40% and improved working efficiency by 50 percent.
50%
80%
50%
頁尾
快速連結
版權宣告

results.title: Phino Electrical Wire & Cable Shenzhen Co Ltd - Company Profile and ...
results.content: Phino Electrical Wire & Cable Shenzhen Co Ltd was founded in 1992. The company's line of business includes the manufacturing of electronic components such as antennas, switches, and waveguides.

results.title: ECHU Special Wire & Cable (Kunshan) Co., Ltd.
results.content: Our main products include: Drag chain cable and robot cables; Industry cable and data cables; Flexible cable and control cables; Elevator travelling cable; Crane cable; Flat crane travelling cable; Shield cable; Electrical cable; High frequency coaxial cable; Drum-reeling cable; Security cable and so on.
results.raw_content:
Focus on Special Cable R & D, Devoted to ECHU Persons' Intellingence
ECHU Special Wire & Cable (Kunshan) Co., Ltd.
ECHU Special Wire & Cable (Kunshan) Co., Ltd.

1. Company establish in 2005
2. Firstly focus on electrical wire & Cables
3. the focus on R & D special cables and won many patients
4 Since 2010, we build our another factory in Kunshan, named ECHU Special Wire & Cable (Kunshan) Co., Ltd.
5. Have several branches over the whole China
6. Focus on produce high quality products to meet customer's normal and special requirement
.......

Drag chain cable and robot cables; Industry cable and data cables; Flexible cable and control cables; Elevator travelling cable; Crane cable; Flat crane travelling cable; Shield cable; Electrical cable; High frequency coaxial cable; Drum-reeling cable; Security cable and so on. ECHU cable is to integrate scheme with complete solution for industrial and mining enterprises, industrial equipment and industrial unit, Industrial Automation.
For special cables, we also can design according to customer's using situation and design according to customer requirement
